__comment: Where factorio folder. Should be in the same folder as this config file.
IP players should connect to to join your servers, should be portforwarded and stuff
IP the master web server runs at, can be ignored on the master system
credentials for factorio MP services, also username will be admin
Token can be used instead of password, but for the most part just ignore
Statistic gathering statistics, may affect server performance (master memory usage especially)
